channel.title: Client
channel.description:
hi , ive just released me isle of blood v2 and i thought it would be cool to have a webclient and a downloadble client for when i get it a dedicated server , could anyone tell me where to start and ill learn from their , ive been reading through the data for zolt's client and bezzas but they where both made by lolwtfbbqhax so i was wondering if it is only him that knows
if you can help thanks
~Andi~
